items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight and user-friendly Note-Taking App built with Angular 19 and Tailwind CSS. This app allows users to create, edit, and delete notes effortlessly while providing a smooth and responsive experience. It also includes pagination for better organization of notes.

This app allows users to create, edit, and delete notes effortlessly while providing a smooth and responsive experience. It also includes pagination for better organization of notes.

items.content_html: A modern, responsive web application built with React that delivers the latest news from various categories in real-time. This app fetches news data from an external API and presents it in an engaging and user-friendly interface. It is designed to be fast, lightweight, and accessible across all devices.
items.title: Trupti-coder/newsApp-Project: A modern, responsive web application built with React that delivers the latest news from various categories in real-time. This app fetches news data from an external API and presents it in an engaging and user-friendly interface. It is designed to be fast, lightweight, and accessible across all devices.
